title: Regression & emotional healing/ non-verbal hypnosis
description:
Dr. Marco Paret is demonstrating his powerful techniques and he is achieving Regression and Emotional healing at the Mesmerismus® Masterclass of non-verbal hypnosis.The subject wants to eliminate a negative emotion from her childhood and she is having a strong experience during the hypnotic state. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
